name: PagerDuty
short_description: PagerDuty, Inc. operates a platform for real-time operations in the United States and internationally.
long_description: PagerDuty, Inc. operates a platform for real-time operations in the United States and internationally. The company's platform harnesses digital signals from virtually any software-enabled system or device, combines it with human response data, and orchestrates teams to take the right actions in real time. Its platform provides event intelligence, incident response, on-call management, business visibility, and advanced analytics solutions to address digital operations management requirements. The company serves various industries, including software and technology, telecommunications, retail, travel and hospitality, media and entertainment, and financial services. PagerDuty, Inc. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
